properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.service
properties.description: the service name to register, default value is ${spring.application.name}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.namespace
properties.description: the namespace of service, default value is "default".

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.heartbeat-interval
properties.description: Seconds interval of Heart beat. Default: 5.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.instance-enabled
properties.description: If instance is enabled to accept request. The default value is true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.token
properties.description: polaris discovery service's username to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.version
properties.description: polaris discovery service's username to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.weight
properties.description: the weight of polaris instance , use to load-balance.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.discovery.service-list-refresh-interval
properties.description: Millis interval of refresh of service info list. Default: 60000.
